name: runson
tagline: A self-hosted runner platform for GitHub Actions
description: Runs On is a self-hosted platform for running GitHub Actions runners on your own infrastructure, allowing full control over CI environments and secrets.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run GitHub Actions workflows on your own infrastructure

features.title: Cost Control
features.description: Avoid GitHub-hosted runner costs by using your own hardware

features.title: Custom Environments
features.description: Configure runners with specific tools, dependencies, or configurations

features.title: Secrets Management
features.description: Keep sensitive credentials on your infrastructure instead of GitHub

features.title: Scalable Architecture
features.description: Add or remove runner capacity based on workflow demands

features.title: Multiple Repositories
features.description: Share runners across multiple GitHub repositories or organizations

features.title: Workflow Isolation
features.description: Run jobs in isolated environments for security and consistency

features.title: Resource Monitoring
features.description: Track CPU, memory, and disk usage across runner instances
